name: Fast Moto Up Hill Lv
description:
Fast Moto Up Hill Lv is a new exciting and realistic bike racing game of 2018. Ride your Bike on dangerous offroad hilly roads and treacherous terrains. So let’s start the engine, hit the gas button and experience the thrill of handling a high speed bike on offroad racing track. Now get ready for offroad bike racing action game and ride your way to victory in the fastest lane of all!
Features:
- Challenging mountain climbing levels which complete you with your racing bike
- A real challenge you face during gameplay
- Perfect & Realistic Moto Bikes
- Free ride and level selection Mode
- Obstacles to avoid
- Realistic & Stunning uphill Mountain Environment
